name: Tower Rampage
description:
After the towers were tired of being climbed by King Kong, destroyed by Godzila, torn apart by Aliens one of them decided to rebel and go fight King Kong. Now it's your mission to destroy all humans and protect your friends towers.

__________________Instructions_______________________________________________________

MovementSDPunchJKick K

Punch: It serves to push the enemy but can destroy the towers unintentionally

Kick : Your best attack against the humans, tip: Take them to the forest without buildings and stomp them

#game_jaaj5
